ygData.subject: Rebreather pricing
ygData.msgSnippet: i know many of you accross all the servers that have high tinkering skills have probably been propositioned to make rebreathers.  especially now that they are
ygData.messageBody:
i know many of you accross all the servers that have high tinkering skills
have probably been propositioned to make rebreathers. especially now that
they are part of the warrior FA quest.

I'm just curious what a reasonable rate might be?
i know it kinda depends on the server, but i have had people tell me to
charge anywhere from 2k - 10k for EACH rebreather. While i don't mind a
profit, i really would hate to be raping my customers, and at the same time
I don't want to undercut everyone else. i tinker because its fun, not as a
way to make cash.

Lomack, Elder of the BCK
Master of Recruiting
www.bck.org
"The Crimson Knights"
Fennin Ro
